  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    QuaternicTuple(double[] values)
    Instantiates a tuple with the values input.
    QuaternicTuple(int n)
    Instantiates a tuple with a size of n and 0 for all values.
    QuaternicTuple(int[] values)
    Instantiates a tuple with the values input.
    QuaternicTuple(int n, double val)
    Instantiates a tuple with a size of n and val for all values.
    QuaternicTuple(int n, Quaternion val)
    Instantiates a tuple with a size of n and val for all values.
    QuaternicTuple(Tuple t)
    Instantiates a quaternic tuple with the real part of a real tuple.
    QuaternicTuple(Tuple r, Tuple i, Tuple j, Tuple k)
    Instantiates a quaternic tuple with the real part of a real tuple,and imaginary parts of other real tuples.
    QuaternicTuple(Quaternion[] values)
    Instantiates a tuple with the values input.

    Method
    Description
    QuaternicTuple
    $A$(double d)
    Adds d to all significant basis magnitudes (e.g [1 2 7] + 6 = [7 9 14] = [7 9 14 0 0 0 0 0 ...] and not [7 9 14 7 7 7 7 7 7 ...]
